name: Cleanpoint
description:
Entry for LOWREZJAM 2022. Made with Pygame/Python Controls:
  • WASD/arrows - move player
  • Aim with mouse
  • LMB - fire your guns
  • Space/ESC - enter to shop+inventory screen (or exit from)
  • LMB+mouse - in shop+inventory: drag'n'drop object from stack onto proper slot (gray - guns, coral - items)
  • R - (when died or won) restart level

You need to recycle garbage to the garbage collectors, avoid death from lurking enemies and do this in time.

Time is going when you are buying stuff in the shop.
